file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 52-21-00-03 - PASSENGER-CABIN ESCAPE HATCHES - SERVICING

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL PASSENGER-CABIN ESCAPE HATCHES - SERVICING EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to lubricate the passenger-cabin escape hatches. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY PASSENGER-CABIN ESCAPE HATCHES - ALL 52-21-00-600-801-A ♦ LUBRICATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 52-21-00 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 52-21-00-600-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. PASSENGER-CABIN ESCAPE HATCHES - LUBRICATION A. General (1) There are two escape hatches in the passenger cabin. They are installed one on each side of the fuselage, above the wing. This procedure makes the hatch removal easier. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION PASSENGER-CABIN ESCAPE-HATCH LINING - RE- AMM TASK 25-23-03-000-801-A/400 MOVAL PASSENGER-CABIN ESCAPE-HATCH LINING - IN- AMM TASK 25-23-03-400-801-A/400 STALLATION AMM TASK 52-21-00-000-801-A/400 PASSENGER-CABIN ESCAPE HATCHES - REMOVAL PASSENGER-CABIN ESCAPE HATCHES - INSTAL- AMM TASK 52-21-00-400-801-A/400 LATION C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 812 Passenger cabin - LH 822 Passenger cabin - RH D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Brush To lubricate the escape hatches AR available F. Consumable Materials SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION QTY (BRAND) MIL-PRF-23827, TYPE I Grease AR G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task On the escape hatches EMB-145 - AMM 1285 600-801-A/300 52-21-00 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Remove the passenger-cabin escape hatches ( AMM TASK 52-21-00-000-801-A/400). (2) Remove the lining of the escape hatches ( AMM TASK 25-23-03-000-801-A/400). J. Lubricate Passenger Cabin Escape Hatch Support Pins (Figure 301) SUBTASK 640-002-A (1) Lubricate the escape hatch latch pin. (2) Lubricate the lower part of the internal shaft. (3) Lubricate the support pins. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the lining of the escape hatches ( AMM TASK 25-23-03-400-801-A/400). WARNING:DO NOT APPLY LUBRICANTS OR SIMILAR PRODUCTS TO THE INTERFACE BETWEEN THE HATCH AND THE FUSELAGE. (2) Install the passenger-cabin escape hatches ( AMM TASK 52-21-00-400-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 600-801-A/300 52-21-00 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
